question: I am on Diltiazem 240 1 daily; Lisinopril HCZT 12.5 2x daily; Fenofibrate 160 1 daily; Warfarin 5 mg 1 daily. and one Ranitidine daily.  I feel like I am taking too many meds.  I know that the diltiazem relaxes the arteries but My BP is down...Can't I get off my Choles med?  Parents died in their 80's with mom having "heart flutter" fairly often.  They did not have strokes.  Mom had altzheimers for 10 years.  Dad had diabetes but was not on heart meds.  My one and only Eco Cardio came back fine after an atrial fib scare in my routine office visit.
title: How many meds should be added to Diltiazem?
